title: Ex-Challenger ADC + Dia Support - Looking for team
body:
Greetings everyone,

my premade and me are currently looking for a Team.

About us:
Main language: German - English
Age                  : 19 / 17
Schedule: Very flexible (at the moment)

**What we bring**: Experienced players / Semi-professional which are always looking to improve in and outside of the game

_Premade : Since 2 years - consistantly_

_**Support**_
Platin 1 - (Peak Diamond 4)

_**ADC**_
Diamond 1 - (Peak Challenger 500 LP)

If you are interested or want further information:

Contact : maxiabels@yahoo.de
_or_
IG : Infinity Lft


_
Yours Maxi aka Infinity Lft
_
